mapper.select: SELECT ord.price, ord.quantity, ord.result, ord.users_userNumber AS usersNumber, ord.products_productnumber AS productsNumber, ord.orders_number AS ordersNumber, ord.p_c_products_custom_number AS productCustomNumber, ord.indate AS inDate, ord.regdate AS regDate, pr.product, pr.title_image AS titleImage, cu.size, cu.color, cu.image AS customImage FROM orders ord INNER JOIN products pr INNER JOIN products_custom cu ON ord.products_productnumber = pr.product_number AND ord.p_c_products_custom_number = cu.products_custom_number

SELECT ord.price, ord.quantity, ord.result, ord.users_usernumber AS usersNumber, ord.products_productnumber AS productsNumber, ord.orders_number AS ordersNumber, ord.p_c_products_custom_number AS productCustomNumber, ord.indate AS inDate, ord.regdate AS regDate, pr.product, pr.title_image AS titleImage, cu.size, cu.color, cu.image AS customImage FROM orders ord INNER JOIN products pr INNER JOIN products_custom cu ON ord.products_productnumber = pr.product_number AND ord.p_c_products_custom_number = cu.products_custom_number WHERE users_userNumber = #{usersNumber}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders( price, quantity, result, users_usernumber, products_productnumber, p_c_products_custom_number, indate, regdate, uuid) VALUE(#{price}, #{quantity}, #{result}, #{usersNumber}, #{productsNumber}, #{productCustomNumber}, #{inDate}, #{regDate}, #{uuid})
